sense.name: Switch from higher beam to lower beam.
sense.examples: I dimmed my headlights upon seeing the oncoming vehicle.

sense.name: Become or make lusterless, perhaps by disuse; become dim by comparison
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[patient[concrete]] DIM NOTE: Do not use for headlights; use Sense 1 instead. Can include metaphorical examples if a light source is implied.
sense.examples: The lights dimmed and the film began. The stage dims just before the curtain rises Bright ideas are dimmed by the old way of governing.

sense.name: Become vague or indistinct.
sense.examples: The contrast between our characters began to dim over time.
